entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 21.
